metadata.title: CVE-2023-30631 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Apache Software FoundationApache Traffic Server. The configuration optionproxy.config.http.push_method_enabled didn't function. However, by defaultthe PUSH method is blocked in the ip_allow configuration file.This issueaffects Apache Traffic Server: from 8.0.0 through 9.2.0. 8.x users shouldupgrade to 8.1.7 or later versions 9.x users should upgrade to 9.2.1 orlater versions

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
